Welcome Adventurers!
Based on your suggestions regarding yesterday's update we have me made some small changes and rebalancing. We hope that you will like it.
Improvements:
- Lowered the Robinia Log requirement of the Bloodthirsty Staff's recipe from 12 to 6. - Added Stem as a drop to the vampires. You should use scavenging to improve your chances to acquire some. - Added Garlic Bread to the game. It is one of the top healing foods available in the game. - Added recipes for Bread and Garlic Bread. - Added the Magical Bronze Arrow to the game. It can be made with the Imbuing skill and provide slight bonuses over the Bronze Arrow.
Sincerely, Daggers & Sorcery Team
